Hotel.name: Best Western Hôtel So'Co by HappyCulture

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Hotel Riviera, you'll be centrally located in Nice, walking distance from Orthodox Cathedral and close to Basilique Notre Dame. This hotel is within close proximity of Nice Etoile Shopping Center and Albert 1st Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-out, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Best Western Hotel Riviera, you'll be centrally located in Nice, walking distance from Orthodox Cathedral and close to Basilique Notre Dame. This hotel is within close proximity of Nice Etoile Shopping Center and Albert 1st Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Orthodox Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Basilique Notre Dame - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Nice Etoile Shopping Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Albert 1st Gardens - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Casino Ruhl - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Verdure Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Promenade des Anglais - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Marc Chagall National Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
St. Roch Hospital - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Place Massena - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Nice Museum of Fine Arts - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Quai des Etats Unis - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Nice Opera - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Courthouse Square - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Cours Saleya - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Riviera is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text: Note: *There is a city tax payable by the guest directly at the hotel.

Essential Information: Room 1
Tax Charges: 21.00 EUR (Excluded i.e. pay to hotel at the time of check-In)

Essential Information:
Hotel do not have a parking lot but there is a public one nearby.
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.
